message: Hi Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a special price of $110. It's a fantastic deal, and I think you'll really love it!
Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $110 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $105 for the product.  Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the counteroffer, Bob! I understand your concerns, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $108 for the product. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy it!
